definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: Engaddei, etc.;—[[עֵין גֶּ֑דִי מְחָדׂת]] 1Sa 23:29, ´[[מִדְבַּר ע]] 1Sa 24:1, ´[[כַּרְמֵי ע]] Ct So 1:14; ´[[ע]]= [[חַחְחוֹן תָּמָר]] (q.v.) acc. to 2Ch 20:2; [[עֵין גֶּ֨דִי֨]] Ez Eze 47:10; mod. ‘Ain ǧidî, on W. shore of Dead Sea, GASm:Geogr.269 f., 512 Buhl:Geogr. 41.164 f.
